speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: ACT V

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: SCENE I. Before PROSPERO'S cell.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Enter PROSPERO in his magic robes, and ARIEL

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Now does my project gather to a head:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: My charms crack not; my spirits obey; and time

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Goes upright with his carriage. How's the day?

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: On the sixth hour; at which time, my lord,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: You said our work should cease.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I did say so,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: When first I raised the tempest. Say, my spirit,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: How fares the king and's followers?

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Confined together

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: In the same fashion as you gave in charge,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Just as you left them; all prisoners, sir,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: In the line-grove which weather-fends your cell;

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: They cannot budge till your release. The king,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: His brother and yours, abide all three distracted

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: And the remainder mourning over them,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Brimful of sorrow and dismay; but chiefly

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Him that you term'd, sir, 'The good old lord Gonzalo;'

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: His tears run down his beard, like winter's drops

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: From eaves of reeds. Your charm so strongly works 'em

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: That if you now beheld them, your affections

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Would become tender.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Dost thou think so, spirit?

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Mine would, sir, were I human.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And mine shall.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Hast thou, which art but air, a touch, a feeling

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Of their afflictions, and shall not myself,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: One of their kind, that relish all as sharply,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Passion as they, be kindlier moved than thou art?

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Though with their high wrongs I am struck to the quick,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Yet with my nobler reason 'gaitist my fury

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Do I take part: the rarer action is

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: In virtue than in vengeance: they being penitent,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: The sole drift of my purpose doth extend

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Not a frown further. Go release them, Ariel:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: My charms I'll break, their senses I'll restore,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And they shall be themselves.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: I'll fetch them, sir.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Exit

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Ye elves of hills, brooks, standing lakes and groves,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And ye that on the sands with printless foot

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Do chase the ebbing Neptune and do fly him

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: When he comes back; you demi-puppets that

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: By moonshine do the green sour ringlets make,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Whereof the ewe not bites, and you whose pastime

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Is to make midnight mushrooms, that rejoice

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To hear the solemn curfew; by whose aid,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Weak masters though ye be, I have bedimm'd

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: The noontide sun, call'd forth the mutinous winds,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And 'twixt the green sea and the azured vault

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Set roaring war: to the dread rattling thunder

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Have I given fire and rifted Jove's stout oak

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: With his own bolt; the strong-based promontory

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Have I made shake and by the spurs pluck'd up

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: The pine and cedar: graves at my command

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Have waked their sleepers, oped, and let 'em forth

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: By my so potent art. But this rough magic

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I here abjure, and, when I have required

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Some heavenly music, which even now I do,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To work mine end upon their senses that

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: This airy charm is for, I'll break my staff,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Bury it certain fathoms in the earth,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And deeper than did ever plummet sound

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I'll drown my book.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Solemn music

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Re-enter ARIEL before: then ALONSO, with a  frantic gesture, attended by GONZALO;  SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO in like manner,  attended by ADRIAN and FRANCISCO   they all  enter the circle which PROSPERO had made,  and there stand charmed; which PROSPERO observing, speaks:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: A solemn air and the best comforter

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To an unsettled fancy cure thy brains,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Now useless, boil'd within thy skull! There stand,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For you are spell-stopp'd.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Holy Gonzalo, honourable man,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Mine eyes, even sociable to the show of thine,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Fall fellowly drops. The charm dissolves apace,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And as the morning steals upon the night,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Melting the darkness, so their rising senses

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Begin to chase the ignorant fumes that mantle

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Their clearer reason. O good Gonzalo,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: My true preserver, and a loyal sir

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To him you follow'st! I will pay thy graces

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Home both in word and deed. Most cruelly

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Didst thou, Alonso, use me and my daughter:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Thy brother was a furtherer in the act.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Thou art pinch'd fort now, Sebastian. Flesh and blood,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: You, brother mine, that entertain'd ambition,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Expell'd remorse and nature; who, with Sebastian,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Whose inward pinches therefore are most strong,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Would here have kill'd your king; I do forgive thee,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Unnatural though thou art. Their understanding

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Begins to swell, and the approaching tide

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Will shortly fill the reasonable shore

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: That now lies foul and muddy. Not one of them

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: That yet looks on me, or would know me Ariel,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Fetch me the hat and rapier in my cell:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I will discase me, and myself present

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: As I was sometime Milan: quickly, spirit;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Thou shalt ere long be free.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: ARIEL sings and helps to attire him

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Where the bee sucks. there suck I:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: In a cowslip's bell I lie;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: There I couch when owls do cry.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: On the bat's back I do fly

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: After summer merrily.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Merrily, merrily shall I live now

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Under the blossom that hangs on the bough.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Why, that's my dainty Ariel! I shall miss thee:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: But yet thou shalt have freedom: so, so, so.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To the king's ship, invisible as thou art:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: There shalt thou find the mariners asleep

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Under the hatches; the master and the boatswain

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Being awake, enforce them to this place,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And presently, I prithee.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: I drink the air before me, and return

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Or ere your pulse twice beat.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Exit

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: All torment, trouble, wonder and amazement

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Inhabits here: some heavenly power guide us

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Out of this fearful country!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Behold, sir king,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: The wronged Duke of Milan, Prospero:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For more assurance that a living prince

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Does now speak to thee, I embrace thy body;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And to thee and thy company I bid

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: A hearty welcome.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Whether thou best he or no,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Or some enchanted trifle to abuse me,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: As late I have been, I not know: thy pulse

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Beats as of flesh and blood; and, since I saw thee,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: The affliction of my mind amends, with which,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I fear, a madness held me: this must crave,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: An if this be at all, a most strange story.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Thy dukedom I resign and do entreat

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Thou pardon me my wrongs. But how should Prospero

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Be living and be here?

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: First, noble friend,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Let me embrace thine age, whose honour cannot

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Be measured or confined.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Whether this be

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Or be not, I'll not swear.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: You do yet taste

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Some subtilties o' the isle, that will not let you

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Believe things certain. Welcome, my friends all!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Aside to SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: But you, my brace of lords, were I so minded,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I here could pluck his highness' frown upon you

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And justify you traitors: at this time

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I will tell no tales.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: [Aside]  The devil speaks in him.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: No.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For you, most wicked sir, whom to call brother

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Would even infect my mouth, I do forgive

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Thy rankest fault; all of them; and require

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: My dukedom of thee, which perforce, I know,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Thou must restore.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: If thou be'st Prospero,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Give us particulars of thy preservation;

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: How thou hast met us here, who three hours since

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Were wreck'd upon this shore; where I have lost--

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: How sharp the point of this remembrance is!--

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: My dear son Ferdinand.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I am woe for't, sir.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Irreparable is the loss, and patience

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Says it is past her cure.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I rather think

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: You have not sought her help, of whose soft grace

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For the like loss I have her sovereign aid

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And rest myself content.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: You the like loss!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: As great to me as late; and, supportable

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To make the dear loss, have I means much weaker

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Than you may call to comfort you, for I

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Have lost my daughter.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: A daughter?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: O heavens, that they were living both in Naples,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: The king and queen there! that they were, I wish

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Myself were mudded in that oozy bed

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Where my son lies. When did you lose your daughter?

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: In this last tempest. I perceive these lords

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: At this encounter do so much admire

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: That they devour their reason and scarce think

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Their eyes do offices of truth, their words

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Are natural breath: but, howsoe'er you have

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Been justled from your senses, know for certain

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: That I am Prospero and that very duke

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Which was thrust forth of Milan, who most strangely

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Upon this shore, where you were wreck'd, was landed,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To be the lord on't. No more yet of this;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For 'tis a chronicle of day by day,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Not a relation for a breakfast nor

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Befitting this first meeting. Welcome, sir;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: This cell's my court: here have I few attendants

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And subjects none abroad: pray you, look in.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: My dukedom since you have given me again,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I will requite you with as good a thing;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: At least bring forth a wonder, to content ye

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: As much as me my dukedom.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Here PROSPERO discovers FERDINAND and MIRANDA playing at chess

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Sweet lord, you play me false.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: No, my dear'st love,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I would not for the world.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Yes, for a score of kingdoms you should wrangle,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: And I would call it, fair play.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: If this prove

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: A vision of the Island, one dear son

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Shall I twice lose.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: A most high miracle!

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Though the seas threaten, they are merciful;

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I have cursed them without cause.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Kneels

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Now all the blessings

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Of a glad father compass thee about!

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Arise, and say how thou camest here.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: O, wonder!

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: How many goodly creatures are there here!

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: How beauteous mankind is! O brave new world,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: That has such people in't!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: 'Tis new to thee.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: What is this maid with whom thou wast at play?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Your eld'st acquaintance cannot be three hours:

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Is she the goddess that hath sever'd us,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: And brought us thus together?

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Sir, she is mortal;

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: But by immortal Providence she's mine:

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I chose her when I could not ask my father

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: For his advice, nor thought I had one. She

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Is daughter to this famous Duke of Milan,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Of whom so often I have heard renown,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: But never saw before; of whom I have

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Received a second life; and second father

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: This lady makes him to me.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I am hers:

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: But, O, how oddly will it sound that I

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Must ask my child forgiveness!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: There, sir, stop:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Let us not burthen our remembrance with

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: A heaviness that's gone.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I have inly wept,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Or should have spoke ere this. Look down, you god,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And on this couple drop a blessed crown!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: For it is you that have chalk'd forth the way

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Which brought us hither.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I say, Amen, Gonzalo!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Was Milan thrust from Milan, that his issue

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Should become kings of Naples? O, rejoice

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Beyond a common joy, and set it down

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: With gold on lasting pillars: In one voyage

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Did Claribel her husband find at Tunis,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And Ferdinand, her brother, found a wife

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Where he himself was lost, Prospero his dukedom

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: In a poor isle and all of us ourselves

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: When no man was his own.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: [To FERDINAND and MIRANDA]  Give me your hands:

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Let grief and sorrow still embrace his heart

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: That doth not wish you joy!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Be it so! Amen!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Re-enter ARIEL, with the Master and Boatswain amazedly following

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: O, look, sir, look, sir! here is more of us:

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I prophesied, if a gallows were on land,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: This fellow could not drown. Now, blasphemy,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: That swear'st grace o'erboard, not an oath on shore?

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Hast thou no mouth by land? What is the news?

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: The best news is, that we have safely found

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Our king and company; the next, our ship--

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Which, but three glasses since, we gave out split--

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Is tight and yare and bravely rigg'd as when

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: We first put out to sea.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: [Aside to PROSPERO]  Sir, all this service

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Have I done since I went.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: [Aside to ARIEL]  My tricksy spirit!

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: These are not natural events; they strengthen

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: From strange to stranger. Say, how came you hither?

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: If I did think, sir, I were well awake,

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: I'ld strive to tell you. We were dead of sleep,

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: And--how we know not--all clapp'd under hatches;

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Where but even now with strange and several noises

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Of roaring, shrieking, howling, jingling chains,

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: And more diversity of sounds, all horrible,

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: We were awaked; straightway, at liberty;

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Where we, in all her trim, freshly beheld

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Our royal, good and gallant ship, our master

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Capering to eye her: on a trice, so please you,

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Even in a dream, were we divided from them

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: And were brought moping hither.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: [Aside to PROSPERO]          Was't well done?

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: [Aside to ARIEL]  Bravely, my diligence. Thou shalt be free.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: This is as strange a maze as e'er men trod

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: And there is in this business more than nature

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Was ever conduct of: some oracle

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Must rectify our knowledge.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Sir, my liege,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Do not infest your mind with beating on

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: The strangeness of this business; at pick'd leisure

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Which shall be shortly, single I'll resolve you,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Which to you shall seem probable, of every

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: These happen'd accidents; till when, be cheerful

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And think of each thing well.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Aside to ARIEL

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Come hither, spirit:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Set Caliban and his companions free;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Untie the spell.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Exit ARIEL

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: How fares my gracious sir?

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: There are yet missing of your company

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Some few odd lads that you remember not.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Re-enter ARIEL, driving in CALIBAN, STEPHANO and TRINCULO, in their stolen apparel

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: Every man shift for all the rest, and

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: let no man take care for himself; for all is

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: but fortune. Coragio, bully-monster, coragio!

speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: If these be true spies which I wear in my head,

speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: here's a goodly sight.

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: O Setebos, these be brave spirits indeed!

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: How fine my master is! I am afraid

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: He will chastise me.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Ha, ha!

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: What things are these, my lord Antonio?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Will money buy 'em?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Very like; one of them

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Is a plain fish, and, no doubt, marketable.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Mark but the badges of these men, my lords,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Then say if they be true. This mis-shapen knave,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: His mother was a witch, and one so strong

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: That could control the moon, make flows and ebbs,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And deal in her command without her power.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: These three have robb'd me; and this demi-devil--

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For he's a bastard one--had plotted with them

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To take my life. Two of these fellows you

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Must know and own; this thing of darkness!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Acknowledge mine.

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: I shall be pinch'd to death.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Is not this Stephano, my drunken butler?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: He is drunk now: where had he wine?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: And Trinculo is reeling ripe: where should they

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Find this grand liquor that hath gilded 'em?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: How camest thou in this pickle?

speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: I have been in such a pickle since I

speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: saw you last that, I fear me, will never out of

speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: my bones: I shall not fear fly-blowing.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Why, how now, Stephano!

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: O, touch me not; I am not Stephano, but a cramp.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: You'ld be king o' the isle, sirrah?

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: I should have been a sore one then.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: This is a strange thing as e'er I look'd on.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Pointing to Caliban

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: He is as disproportion'd in his manners

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: As in his shape. Go, sirrah, to my cell;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Take with you your companions; as you look

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To have my pardon, trim it handsomely.

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: Ay, that I will; and I'll be wise hereafter

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: And seek for grace. What a thrice-double ass

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: Was I, to take this drunkard for a god

speaker: CALIBAN
text_entry: And worship this dull fool!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Go to; away!

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Hence, and bestow your luggage where you found it.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Or stole it, rather.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Exeunt CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Sir, I invite your highness and your train

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: To my poor cell, where you shall take your rest

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For this one night; which, part of it, I'll waste

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: With such discourse as, I not doubt, shall make it

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Go quick away; the story of my life

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And the particular accidents gone by

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Since I came to this isle: and in the morn

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I'll bring you to your ship and so to Naples,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Where I have hope to see the nuptial

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Of these our dear-beloved solemnized;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And thence retire me to my Milan, where

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Every third thought shall be my grave.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I long

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: To hear the story of your life, which must

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Take the ear strangely.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I'll deliver all;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And promise you calm seas, auspicious gales

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And sail so expeditious that shall catch

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Your royal fleet far off.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Aside to ARIEL

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: My Ariel, chick,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: That is thy charge: then to the elements

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Be free, and fare thou well! Please you, draw near.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: EPILOGUE

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: SPOKEN BY PROSPERO

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Now my charms are all o'erthrown,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And what strength I have's mine own,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Which is most faint: now, 'tis true,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: I must be here confined by you,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Or sent to Naples. Let me not,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Since I have my dukedom got

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And pardon'd the deceiver, dwell

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: In this bare island by your spell;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: But release me from my bands

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: With the help of your good hands:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Gentle breath of yours my sails

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Must fill, or else my project fails,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Which was to please. Now I want

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Spirits to enforce, art to enchant,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And my ending is despair,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Unless I be relieved by prayer,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Which pierces so that it assaults

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Mercy itself and frees all faults.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: As you from crimes would pardon'd be,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Let your indulgence set me free.
